summary: HD texture replacement that make all barrels in the game look the same.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b]What does this mod do? [/b][/size]
HD texture replacement that improves barrel appearance & makes all barrels in the game look the same.[b]

[/b][size=3][b]Description[/b][/size]
It always annoyed me that you could easily tell which barrels could be opened & which could not based upon their texture/appearance in the vanilla game. Here's a small texture replacer to provide HD barrels texture (1024x2048) & to make openable & non-openable barrels look similar.

[size=3][b]Installation[/b][/size]
Extract the archive file to your skyrim/data folder
... OR ... install using Mod-Manager or NMM.

[size=3][b]Conflict[/b][/size]
Shouldn't be any mod conflicts.

[size=3][b]Credits[/b][/size]
Original HD barrel texture by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/238/?][b]quazaque[/b][/url]

[size=3][b]Versions/Updates[/b][/size]
Ver 1.0 - (11 Sept 2015) Initial release.
author: pcaviator
